alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 05 at 8:15AM MDT until August 06 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts to 45 mph on the east shore of Flathead Lake and for eastern portions of the Flathead and Mission Valleys near the Swan and Mission Ranges. Elsewhere, northeast winds 10 to 15 mph with gusts to 25 mph. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Choppy lake conditions will develop quickly this evening with the arrival of northeast winds.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
